channel.title: Computing on varium et mutabile
channel.description: Recent content in Computing on varium et mutabile

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Welcome to this site. You will eventually see that I have interests span many areas including: Philosophy – of knowledge, of objects, of persons – and ethics and ultimately the various manifestations of spirit in the world Mathematical, probabilistic and statistical modeling and computing Art – its practice, influences, history Linguistics – especially indo-european and semitic languages Anything else as all knowledge is fair game
